name: Gentleman
description:
Gentlemen starts with five girls wearing different clothing, among whose bodies you are required to find the existing differences. The difference with other games of the same genre is, when you touch a girl, she will make a lovely sound that will certainly give you a lot of joy.

Feature:
· Find the physical differences among the girls.
· Caress the girl and hear her voice.
· Get more than 20 moan.


All you need to play the game is a mouse..
